messages.content: Who is your favorite human?

I love Lu, she is my favorite. She caters to me all day and even knows the sound of how I eat. She's also awesome bc she knows how to pet me, and I'm a picky ahole. She pets me between my eyes until I yawn.
Who do you live with?
Chrissy (Other Mom), Kitty, Mom (Lu)
What is Chrissy like?
She tries to cuddle because I'm so cute but I run. So she usually yells from afar OH MY GOD YOU'RE SO CUTE, SHUT THE FUCK UP
Do you like those little spongy balls?
Not as much as Kitty. Mostly I prefer playing with sugar packets and those silvervine sticks. Twist ties, bottle caps, omg, I frikken love those.
Tell me more about the sugar packets

They are FRIKKEN FUN! I guess I like the sound and how fast it flies when I slap it. Usually, tho, it ends up under the couch and I forget about it until we move. While I wait, tho, I meow in the middle of the night when I remember my packets.
Do you smell good?
I smell great. Nobody knows how that happens but truly, I smell like cinnamon rolls sometimes. Never like poo, that's for Kitty to smell like.
Where were you born?
In Flanders. I'm Belgian! Kitty is Walloon ha ha.
What's the longest you've gone just meowing?
Four frikken hours, prolly. I enjoy meowing and some nights, try to win a gold medal from meowing. I'm not sure what I'm trying to win but I'm sure I'm winning.
What's your favorite food?
I love the food I eat. It's called Royal Canin and it's the best. I also love the treats I get, they are called Temptations. I love the chicken flavor.
Do you like open windows?
Most times. They let me see the birds but the sun is also bright af. Lately though, I've just been staring at some boring ass fields. Get me to a city, I like watching PEOPLE and those huge crows.
How do you drink water?

I drink it like an idiot. It gets all over the floor, makes no sense. I guess I lick it over the side. Then we gotta clean it up before it soaks into the floors and everyone's socks and paws get wet, totally annoying.
What's your favorite food?
Most days it's grass. It makes me throw up and then I eat it again. So, grass, I guess. But I also like Kitty's vomit, esp when it's filled with warm digested food.
Wait, what did I just say?
If I'm crazy for thinking she runs like Phoebe from Friends. And yeah she does. Frikki drinks like a cat and it makes me laugh. He gets so close his nose gets wet.
You ever watch Family Guy?
Yeah. It's where I got the butter-dog thing from. Luuul.
What's the butter dog thing?
Butter melts so when I eat it, it gets all over the floor. Then I stand in it and it gets on my fur. When KITTY III finds out, she yells 'Butter dog!' So now I run when she calls me.
You ever ate red beans and rice?
Yeah and they tasted like heaven so I don't know why I got over it.
You Cajun?
I am. He got the name cuz I'm F riend!
That don't even make any sense
If I say 'Get it together, you're smart' and you still get it wrong? Ya, that. I mean, if sugar is bad for me, how come I try to lick it off your legs?
What I asked?
I run so much I guess I make her feet sore. She calls it 'Finnish trotting.'
